sentences.en: A chypre , spicy harmony with notes of Coriander , Clove, Oakmoss and Ambergris.

sentences.en: A classic of Thailand prepared at your table – chicken, lime, galangal, coriander and coconut.

sentences.en: Add coriander. Cover pot . Splash wine over . Serve in pot.
sentences.cn: 加入芫荽, 再盖好,赞绍酒,原锅上桌.

sentences.en: And coriander honey, the poster announces in extra - large print, increases male potency.
sentences.cn: 海报大篇幅地称胡荽蜜能增加男人的力量.

sentences.en: But, easy to contract cold's person, actually should avoid the edible coriander.
sentences.cn: 但是, 容易患感冒的人, 却应该避免食用香菜.

sentences.en: Chop up the coriander and mix some of it in the tofu.
sentences.cn: 芫茜切碎,部分拌入豆腐中.

sentences.en: Coriander is the dried fruit of a herb with several branches and leaves with jagged edges.
sentences.cn: 胡荽是一种香草植物,它有着许多的枝干,叶子的边缘呈锯齿装.

sentences.en: Garnish each plate with a sprig of coriander and serve.
sentences.cn: 给每道菜配上一小枝芫荽然后上菜。

sentences.en: INGREDIENTS: Wheat flour , Meat Floss , Sugar , Egg, Coriander Leaf , Coconut Milk.

sentences.en: My favourite was shredded pig's ear with jelly fish, white cabbage, yellow mustard and coriander oil.
sentences.cn: 我最喜欢的是猪耳丝拌海蛰 、 洋白菜 、 黄色的芥末和芫荽油.

sentences.en: Oils of Black Pepper, Coriander, Onion, Hot Pepper, Cardamom, Garlic, Ginger.

sentences.en: Serve with coriander placed on the fish.

sentences.cn: 然后撒上炸脆的乾葱头 、 腰果 、 无核提子乾和芫荽.

sentences.en: The chicken was garnished with coriander and red chilli.
sentences.cn: 这道鸡配上了芫荽和红辣椒.

sentences.en: The pickled vegetable of bottled coriander heart is convenient and high quality.

sentences.en: They serve prosciutto - wrapped monkfish with a cumin - coriander crust.
sentences.cn: 他们提供意大利熏火腿包着鱿鱼芹果胡荽外壳.
